school_name: New York City College of Technology
comments: Easy grader. No final exam or midterm. Doesn\'t speak clear. But once you do your lab and get him to sign it you can leave.

school_name: New York City College of Technology
comments: He speaks low but is a very good professor. Eager to teach if you don\'t understand the material. Makes Chemistry easier to understand.

school_name: New York City College of Technology
comments: He speaks very low & makes all of students to come up front. Do ur lab & make sure he check it off & ur ready to go. Make sure u answer all the questions correctly on the lab sheet and homework b/c he counts that for the grade. There was no final exam for him, so he took 11 best labs and that made r final 25% of the grade for this class.

school_name: New York City College of Technology
comments: This man speaks as if he is speaking to himself. This man acts like he has a problem with his voice which keeps him from speaking louder. I did not do well in his class and I am going to take a different professor the next time around. Do not take his lab course either because from what I have heard, this man is terrible. Just don\'t take him.

school_name: New York City College of Technology
comments: His class is not hard or difficult, it just involves alot of studying. If you have all the time to study then you will do fine but if you don\'t then don\'t expect a high grade. He is very easy going when grading.

school_name: New York City College of Technology
comments: Dr. Rudduck is not a clear professor. His class is a huge mistake and the only people that stand a chance of passing this person\'s class is someone who has a well prior knowledge of chemistry. But to be fair, his class gets easier as more students drop the class, what a shame.
